data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Inspirational Vol. 4
data.detailed_description:
The newest entry in the popular Inspirational series rounds out the packs with a variety of themes with an ambient and funky undertone.

Composed by JDB Artist, Inspirational Vol. 4 is a fantastic addition to your music library. Whether you're looking for a modern tune with personality or a more classic fantasy piece, this pack is a must-have!

This pack contains:
  • 37 BGM tracks.
  • Covers a variety of situations and moods.
  • In .MP3 and .OGG format.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG/IG Maker projects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
